13#define TAG "FuriHalRtc"

15#define FURI_HAL_RTC_LSE_STARTUP_TIME 300
16
17#define FURI_HAL_RTC_CLOCK_IS_READY() (LL_RCC_LSE_IsReady() && LL_RCC_LSI1_IsReady())
18
19#define FURI_HAL_RTC_HEADER_MAGIC 0x10F1
20#define FURI_HAL_RTC_HEADER_VERSION 0
21
22typedef struct {
23 uint16_t magic;
24 uint8_t version;
25 uint8_t unused;
26} FuriHalRtcHeader;
27
28typedef struct {
29 uint8_t log_level : 4;
30 uint8_t log_reserved : 4;
31 uint8_t flags;
32 FuriHalRtcBootMode boot_mode : 4;
33 FuriHalRtcHeapTrackMode heap_track_mode : 2;
34 FuriHalRtcLocaleUnits locale_units : 1;
35 FuriHalRtcLocaleTimeFormat locale_timeformat : 1;
36 FuriHalRtcLocaleDateFormat locale_dateformat : 2;
37 uint8_t reserved : 6;
38} SystemReg;
39
40_Static_assert(sizeof(SystemReg) == 4, "SystemReg size mismatch");
41
42#define FURI_HAL_RTC_SECONDS_PER_MINUTE 60
43#define FURI_HAL_RTC_SECONDS_PER_HOUR (FURI_HAL_RTC_SECONDS_PER_MINUTE * 60)
44#define FURI_HAL_RTC_SECONDS_PER_DAY (FURI_HAL_RTC_SECONDS_PER_HOUR * 24)
45#define FURI_HAL_RTC_MONTHS_COUNT 12
46#define FURI_HAL_RTC_EPOCH_START_YEAR 1970
47
48static const uint8_t furi_hal_rtc_days_per_month[2][FURI_HAL_RTC_MONTHS_COUNT] = {
49 {31, 28, 31, 30, 31, 30, 31, 31, 30, 31, 30, 31},
50 {31, 29, 31, 30, 31, 30, 31, 31, 30, 31, 30, 31}};
51
52static const uint16_t furi_hal_rtc_days_per_year[] = {365, 366};
53
54static void furi_hal_rtc_reset() {
55 LL_RCC_ForceBackupDomainReset();
56 LL_RCC_ReleaseBackupDomainReset();
57}
58
59static bool furi_hal_rtc_start_clock_and_switch() {
60 // Clock operation require access to Backup Domain
61 LL_PWR_EnableBkUpAccess();
62
63 // Enable LSI and LSE
64 LL_RCC_LSI1_Enable();
65 LL_RCC_LSE_SetDriveCapability(LL_RCC_LSEDRIVE_HIGH);
66 LL_RCC_LSE_Enable();
67
68 // Wait for LSI and LSE startup
69 uint32_t c = 0;
70 while(!FURI_HAL_RTC_CLOCK_IS_READY() && c < FURI_HAL_RTC_LSE_STARTUP_TIME) {
71 LL_mDelay(1);
72 c++;
73 }
74
75 if(FURI_HAL_RTC_CLOCK_IS_READY()) {
76 LL_RCC_SetRTCClockSource(LL_RCC_RTC_CLKSOURCE_LSE);
77 LL_RCC_EnableRTC();
78 return LL_RCC_GetRTCClockSource() == LL_RCC_RTC_CLKSOURCE_LSE;
79 } else {
80 return false;
81 }
82}
83
84static void furi_hal_rtc_recover() {
85 FuriHalRtcDateTime datetime = {0};
86
87 // Handle fixable LSE failure
88 if(LL_RCC_LSE_IsCSSDetected()) {
89 furi_hal_light_sequence("rgb B");
90 // Shutdown LSE and LSECSS
91 LL_RCC_LSE_DisableCSS();
92 LL_RCC_LSE_Disable();
93 } else {
94 furi_hal_light_sequence("rgb R");
95 }
96
97 // Temporary switch to LSI
98 LL_RCC_SetRTCClockSource(LL_RCC_RTC_CLKSOURCE_LSI);
99 if(LL_RCC_GetRTCClockSource() == LL_RCC_RTC_CLKSOURCE_LSI) {
100 // Get datetime before RTC Domain reset
101 furi_hal_rtc_get_datetime(&datetime);
102 }
103
104 // Reset RTC Domain
105 furi_hal_rtc_reset();
106
107 // Start Clock
108 if(!furi_hal_rtc_start_clock_and_switch()) {
109 // Plan C: reset RTC and restart
110 furi_hal_light_sequence("rgb R.r.R.r.R.r");
111 furi_hal_rtc_reset();
112 NVIC_SystemReset();
113 }
114
115 // Set date if it valid
116 if(datetime.year != 0) {
117 furi_hal_rtc_set_datetime(&datetime);
118 }
119}
120
121void furi_hal_rtc_init_early() {
122 // Enable RTCAPB clock
123 LL_APB1_GRP1_EnableClock(LL_APB1_GRP1_PERIPH_RTCAPB);
124
125 // Prepare clock
126 if(!furi_hal_rtc_start_clock_and_switch()) {
127 // Plan B: try to recover
128 furi_hal_rtc_recover();
129 }
130
131 // Verify header register
132 uint32_t data_reg = furi_hal_rtc_get_register(FuriHalRtcRegisterHeader);
133 FuriHalRtcHeader* data = (FuriHalRtcHeader*)&data_reg;
134 if(data->magic != FURI_HAL_RTC_HEADER_MAGIC || data->version != FURI_HAL_RTC_HEADER_VERSION) {
135 // Reset all our registers to ensure consistency
136 for(size_t i = 0; i < FuriHalRtcRegisterMAX; i++) {
137 furi_hal_rtc_set_register(i, 0);
138 }
139 data->magic = FURI_HAL_RTC_HEADER_MAGIC;
140 data->version = FURI_HAL_RTC_HEADER_VERSION;
141 furi_hal_rtc_set_register(FuriHalRtcRegisterHeader, data_reg);
142 }
143
144 if(furi_hal_rtc_is_flag_set(FuriHalRtcFlagDebug)) {
145 furi_hal_debug_enable();
146 } else {
147 furi_hal_debug_disable();
148 }
149}
150
151void furi_hal_rtc_deinit_early() {
152}
153
154void furi_hal_rtc_init() {
155 LL_RTC_InitTypeDef RTC_InitStruct;
156 RTC_InitStruct.HourFormat = LL_RTC_HOURFORMAT_24HOUR;
157 RTC_InitStruct.AsynchPrescaler = 127;
158 RTC_InitStruct.SynchPrescaler = 255;
159 LL_RTC_Init(RTC, &RTC_InitStruct);
160
161 furi_log_set_level(furi_hal_rtc_get_log_level());
162
163 FURI_LOG_I(TAG, "Init OK");
164}
165
166void furi_hal_rtc_sync_shadow() {
167 if(!LL_RTC_IsShadowRegBypassEnabled(RTC)) {
168 LL_RTC_ClearFlag_RS(RTC);
169 while(!LL_RTC_IsActiveFlag_RS(RTC)) {
170 };
171 }
172}
173
174uint32_t furi_hal_rtc_get_register(FuriHalRtcRegister reg) {
175 return LL_RTC_BAK_GetRegister(RTC, reg);
176}

178void furi_hal_rtc_set_register(FuriHalRtcRegister reg, uint32_t value) {
179 LL_RTC_BAK_SetRegister(RTC, reg, value);
180}

182void furi_hal_rtc_set_log_level(uint8_t level) {
183 uint32_t data_reg = furi_hal_rtc_get_register(FuriHalRtcRegisterSystem);
184 SystemReg* data = (SystemReg*)&data_reg;
185 data->log_level = level;
186 furi_hal_rtc_set_register(FuriHalRtcRegisterSystem, data_reg);
187 furi_log_set_level(level);
188}

193 return data->log_level;

196void furi_hal_rtc_set_flag(FuriHalRtcFlag flag) {
197 uint32_t data_reg = furi_hal_rtc_get_register(FuriHalRtcRegisterSystem);
198 SystemReg* data = (SystemReg*)&data_reg;
199 data->flags |= flag;
200 furi_hal_rtc_set_register(FuriHalRtcRegisterSystem, data_reg);
201
202 if(flag & FuriHalRtcFlagDebug) {
203 furi_hal_debug_enable();
204 }
205}
206
207void furi_hal_rtc_reset_flag(FuriHalRtcFlag flag) {
208 uint32_t data_reg = furi_hal_rtc_get_register(FuriHalRtcRegisterSystem);
209 SystemReg* data = (SystemReg*)&data_reg;
210 data->flags &= ~flag;
211 furi_hal_rtc_set_register(FuriHalRtcRegisterSystem, data_reg);
212
213 if(flag & FuriHalRtcFlagDebug) {
214 furi_hal_debug_disable();
215 }
216}

218bool furi_hal_rtc_is_flag_set(FuriHalRtcFlag flag) {
219 uint32_t data_reg = furi_hal_rtc_get_register(FuriHalRtcRegisterSystem);
220 SystemReg* data = (SystemReg*)&data_reg;
221 return data->flags & flag;
222}

289void furi_hal_rtc_set_datetime(FuriHalRtcDateTime* datetime) {
290 furi_check(!FURI_IS_IRQ_MODE());
291 furi_assert(datetime);
292
293 FURI_CRITICAL_ENTER();
294 /* Disable write protection */
295 LL_RTC_DisableWriteProtection(RTC);
296
297 /* Enter Initialization mode and wait for INIT flag to be set */
298 LL_RTC_EnableInitMode(RTC);
299 while(!LL_RTC_IsActiveFlag_INIT(RTC)) {
300 }
301
302 /* Set time */
303 LL_RTC_TIME_Config(
304 RTC,
305 LL_RTC_TIME_FORMAT_AM_OR_24,
306 __LL_RTC_CONVERT_BIN2BCD(datetime->hour),
307 __LL_RTC_CONVERT_BIN2BCD(datetime->minute),
308 __LL_RTC_CONVERT_BIN2BCD(datetime->second));
309
310 /* Set date */
311 LL_RTC_DATE_Config(
312 RTC,
313 datetime->weekday,
314 __LL_RTC_CONVERT_BIN2BCD(datetime->day),
315 __LL_RTC_CONVERT_BIN2BCD(datetime->month),
316 __LL_RTC_CONVERT_BIN2BCD(datetime->year - 2000));
317
318 /* Exit Initialization mode */
319 LL_RTC_DisableInitMode(RTC);
320
321 furi_hal_rtc_sync_shadow();
322
323 /* Enable write protection */
324 LL_RTC_EnableWriteProtection(RTC);
325 FURI_CRITICAL_EXIT();
326}
327
328void furi_hal_rtc_get_datetime(FuriHalRtcDateTime* datetime) {
329 furi_check(!FURI_IS_IRQ_MODE());
330 furi_assert(datetime);
331
332 FURI_CRITICAL_ENTER();
333 uint32_t time = LL_RTC_TIME_Get(RTC); // 0x00HHMMSS
334 uint32_t date = LL_RTC_DATE_Get(RTC); // 0xWWDDMMYY
335 FURI_CRITICAL_EXIT();
336
337 datetime->second = __LL_RTC_CONVERT_BCD2BIN((time >> 0) & 0xFF);
338 datetime->minute = __LL_RTC_CONVERT_BCD2BIN((time >> 8) & 0xFF);
339 datetime->hour = __LL_RTC_CONVERT_BCD2BIN((time >> 16) & 0xFF);
340 datetime->year = __LL_RTC_CONVERT_BCD2BIN((date >> 0) & 0xFF) + 2000;
341 datetime->month = __LL_RTC_CONVERT_BCD2BIN((date >> 8) & 0xFF);
342 datetime->day = __LL_RTC_CONVERT_BCD2BIN((date >> 16) & 0xFF);
343 datetime->weekday = __LL_RTC_CONVERT_BCD2BIN((date >> 24) & 0xFF);
344}
345
346bool furi_hal_rtc_validate_datetime(FuriHalRtcDateTime* datetime) {
347 bool invalid = false;
348
349 invalid |= (datetime->second > 59);
350 invalid |= (datetime->minute > 59);
351 invalid |= (datetime->hour > 23);
352
353 invalid |= (datetime->year < 2000);
354 invalid |= (datetime->year > 2099);
355
356 invalid |= (datetime->month == 0);
357 invalid |= (datetime->month > 12);
358
359 invalid |= (datetime->day == 0);
360 invalid |= (datetime->day > 31);
361
362 invalid |= (datetime->weekday == 0);
363 invalid |= (datetime->weekday > 7);
364
365 return !invalid;
366}

384uint32_t furi_hal_rtc_get_timestamp() {
385 FuriHalRtcDateTime datetime = {0};
386 furi_hal_rtc_get_datetime(&datetime);
387 return furi_hal_rtc_datetime_to_timestamp(&datetime);
388}
389
390uint32_t furi_hal_rtc_datetime_to_timestamp(FuriHalRtcDateTime* datetime) {
391 uint32_t timestamp = 0;
392 uint8_t years = 0;
393 uint8_t leap_years = 0;
394
395 for(uint16_t y = FURI_HAL_RTC_EPOCH_START_YEAR; y < datetime->year; y++) {
396 if(furi_hal_rtc_is_leap_year(y)) {
397 leap_years++;
398 } else {
399 years++;
400 }
401 }
402
403 timestamp +=
404 ((years * furi_hal_rtc_days_per_year[0]) + (leap_years * furi_hal_rtc_days_per_year[1])) *
405 FURI_HAL_RTC_SECONDS_PER_DAY;
406
407 bool leap_year = furi_hal_rtc_is_leap_year(datetime->year);
408
409 for(uint8_t m = 1; m < datetime->month; m++) {
410 timestamp += furi_hal_rtc_get_days_per_month(leap_year, m) * FURI_HAL_RTC_SECONDS_PER_DAY;
411 }
412
413 timestamp += (datetime->day - 1) * FURI_HAL_RTC_SECONDS_PER_DAY;
414 timestamp += datetime->hour * FURI_HAL_RTC_SECONDS_PER_HOUR;
415 timestamp += datetime->minute * FURI_HAL_RTC_SECONDS_PER_MINUTE;
416 timestamp += datetime->second;
417
418 return timestamp;
419}
420
421uint16_t furi_hal_rtc_get_days_per_year(uint16_t year) {
422 return furi_hal_rtc_days_per_year[furi_hal_rtc_is_leap_year(year) ? 1 : 0];
423}
424
425bool furi_hal_rtc_is_leap_year(uint16_t year) {
426 return (((year) % 4 == 0) && ((year) % 100 != 0)) || ((year) % 400 == 0);
427}
428
429uint8_t furi_hal_rtc_get_days_per_month(bool leap_year, uint8_t month) {
430 return furi_hal_rtc_days_per_month[leap_year ? 1 : 0][month - 1];
431}
